data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cannicci, Stefano, Ng, Peter L. K. (2017): A new species of micro-mangrove crab of the genus Haberma Ng & Schubart, 2002 (Crustacea, Brachyura, Sesarmidae) from Hong Kong. ZooKeys 662: 67-78, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.662.11908, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.662.11908
